mapper.insert: insert into onelinereview(userId, movieId, score, comment) values(#{userId}, #{movieId}, #{score}, #{content});
mapper.update: update onelinereview set score=#{score}, comment=#{content}, moddate=now() where oneLineReviewId=#{olrId};
update onelinereview set likes=#{likeNum}, dislikes=#{dislikeNum} where oneLineReviewId=#{oneLineReviewId};
mapper.select: select count(oneLineReviewId) from onelinereview where oneLineReviewId>=#{oneLineReviewId} ;

select a.movieId, a.score, a.comment, a.likes, a.gendate, a.oneLineReviewId from onelinereview as a join onelinereviewlike as b on a.oneLineReviewId = b.oneLineReviewId where b.userId=#{userId} and b.mode=1 order by oneLineReviewId DESC limit #{nowPageStart}, #{Size};
